product_details.name: Classic Cruiser: Vintage-Inspired Custom Motorcycle - Raw Power Meets Timeless Style
product_details.description:
• Iconic cruiser-style design with classic silhouette and modern engineering
• Premium disc brake system for superior stopping power and safety
• Comfortable ergonomic seating position with custom leather seat
• Powerful V-twin engine delivering smooth and reliable performance
• Custom exhaust system for that signature deep rumble
• Wide profile tires for excellent road grip and stability
• Classic round headlight with modern LED technology
• Low-slung profile with perfect weight distribution
• Chrome and black finish for striking visual appeal
• Dual shock rear suspension for comfortable riding experience
• Custom handlebar setup for optimal control and maneuverability
• Authentic retro styling with modern mechanical reliability

banner_details:
This banner features a bold and modern promotional design for a motorcycle. The product is visually centered with a detailed and high-contrast illustration ("product_image"), which gives a rugged and powerful aesthetic. At the top, the headline ("heading") uses a futuristic, bold font to convey strength and style. Just below, the tagline ("tagline") in a subtle gray acts as a secondary message to support the brand. The price ("price") is presented prominently with high contrast for quick visibility. A clear call-to-action button ("cta_button" and "cta") appears toward the bottom in a deep red tone, encouraging immediate action.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: `#232323` (Background)
- Dark Charcoal: `#333333`, `#111111`, `#444444` (Shading & shape accents)
- Steel Gray: `#C0C0C0` (Tagline and background strokes)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (Text and highlights)
- Deep Maroon: `#862D2D` (Accent circles and button)
product_color: The product image of the motorcycle features a bold and gritty color palette dominated by deep maroon-black (#2B1B1C), off-white (#F5F4F2), and subtle metallic silver-gray (#B4B4B4). The dark outlines and shadows enhance the mechanical details, while off-white areas highlight the body and give a clean, reflective contrast. The maroon-black subtly blends into shadows and textures, offering depth and realism. Accents of reddish highlight (#874442) and tire black (#1C1C1C) add dimension and intensity. For an advertisement banner, blending these bold tones with a slight metallic gradient background can emphasize durability and ruggedness, creating a visually thrilling and dynamic feel.
